DaD.handler

Class DungeonHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.handler.DungeonHandler

  • public class DungeonHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to handle dungeons. When hero want to enter a dungeon it is redirected here. Every events will be handled here.
    See Also:
    DungeonInstance, DungeonRoomInstance, DungeonTemplate, DungeonRoomTemplate

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DungeonInstance _dungeon
      Instance of the dungeon to handle.
      private static DungeonHandler _instance
      Private instance of class.
      private static java.lang.String[] _options
      All available options.

      DungeonExitState dungeonLoop(Hero hero)
      For each room in the dungeon, call dungeonRoomMenu() and call the right function depending on the choice made by player.

      Display dungeon options to player and return his choice

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final DungeonHandler getInstance()
        Accessor for private instance of class.
        Returns:
        DungeonHandler

      • dungeonSetting

        public DungeonInstance dungeonSetting(Hero hero)
        Function that makes the hero choose which dungeon he wants to enter.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero entering the dungeon
        Returns:
        DungeonInstance

      • enterDungeon

        public void enterDungeon(Hero hero,
                         DungeonInstance dungeonInstance)
        Here we handle all event while in dungeon, displaying menu, entering room and give rewards. This is done by calling several sub-function.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero that enter the dungeon
        dungeonInstance - Chosen dungeonInstance

      • dungeonLoop

        public DungeonExitState dungeonLoop(Hero hero)
        For each room in the dungeon, call dungeonRoomMenu() and call the right function depending on the choice made by player.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero entering dungeon
        Returns:
        DungeonExitState

      • dungeonRoomMenu

        public int dungeonRoomMenu()
        Display dungeon options to player and return his choice
        Returns:
        int

      • initializeDungeon

        public void initializeDungeon(Hero hero,
                              DungeonInstance dungeonInstance)
        Called at the beginning of enterDungeon, we set the attribute _dungeon and later can be used to apply special effect to the hero.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero entering dungeon
        dungeonInstance - Dungeon hero is entering in

      • endDungeon

        public void endDungeon(Hero hero)
        Called at the end of the dungeon, when hero has finished it. Give rewards and clean buffs.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero that has finished the dungeon

      • giveReward

        private void giveReward(Hero hero)
        Give to the hero rewards for finishing dungeon.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero who receives rewards
